title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Contextual Language Learning: Acquisition of Beginner-Level Chinese Idioms Through Real-Life Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character literacy and proficiency in fundamental smartphone functions
context.additional_context: Customized language education program for working professionals, focusing on practical Sino-Korean idiom learning applicable to workplace contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain eight or more Sino-Korean idioms by combining them with photographed real-life examples
Learners can conduct one or more context-based discussion sessions with peer learners using self-generated content
Learners can systematically document five or more contextualized applications of Sino-Korean idioms in their project portfolios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
